LanguageData.HumanlikeGhoul_ResetWarring: Note: this will change WorkPage content also! Most config need reload save to get work
LanguageData.HumanlikeGhoul_ResetNoneTooltip: Recommend to see what origin ghoul setting,most of mod feature will fail when this work
LanguageData.HumanlikeGhoul_ResetDefaultTooltip: Author using setting,ghoul can do easy work and use melee armor
LanguageData.HumanlikeGhoul_ResetAdvanceTooltip: Ghoul can do most things,you can even made a colony of ghoul only
LanguageData.HumanlikeGhoul_StatsPageInfo: Note:All change this page should click button to affect game!
LanguageData.HuamnlikeGhoul_IdeoLimitToolTip: Set whether ghoul can have ideo
LanguageData.HuamnlikeGhoul_EquipmentLimitToolTip: Set whether ghoul can use Equipment(However,due to origin code,just inflect ghoul spawn,i will remake it latter)
LanguageData.HuamnlikeGhoul_GeneLimitToolTip: If set not ,ghoul can use some banned Gene etc blood gene(the gene ablity should goto ablity limit set)
LanguageData.HuamnlikeGhoul_AblityLimitToolTip: If set not ,ghoul can use other ablity rather only ghoul prosthetics ablities(need restart the game)
